context.p: This task describes the correct method for removing the engine oil filter from machine.

step.cmd: Turn off the engine and allow it to cool down(at list 15 minutes).
Wear protective gloves and safety goggles.
Place a driptray below the engine filter to coollect oil spilage.
Locate the engine oil filter wrench, turn the filter counter clockwise to loosen it.
Carefully remove the filter by hand, keep it upright to prevent oil spill.
Dispose of the used filter as per environment all safety guidelines.

result.p: The engine oil filter is successfully removed and ready for replacement.
